scripts.test:all: mkdir -p results && K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=results/report_all_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).html k6 run --out csv=results/results_all_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).csv script.js
scripts.test:smoke:ft: mkdir -p results && K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=results/report_smoke_ft_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).html k6 run --env SCENARIO=smoke --env FT=true --out csv=results/results_smoke_ft_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).csv script.js
scripts.test:smoke:no-ft: mkdir -p results && K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=results/report_smoke_noft_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).html k6 run --env SCENARIO=smoke --env FT=false --out csv=results/results_smoke_noft_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).csv script.js
scripts.test:load:ft: mkdir -p results && K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=results/report_load_ft_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).html k6 run --env SCENARIO=load --env FT=true --out csv=results/results_load_ft_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).csv script.js
scripts.test:load:no-ft: mkdir -p results && K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=results/report_load_noft_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).html k6 run --env SCENARIO=load --env FT=false --out csv=results/results_load_noft_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).csv script.js
scripts.test:spike:ft: mkdir -p results && K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=results/report_spike_ft_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).html k6 run --env SCENARIO=spike --env FT=true --out csv=results/results_spike_ft_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).csv script.js
scripts.test:spike:no-ft: mkdir -p results && K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=results/report_spike_noft_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).html k6 run --env SCENARIO=spike --env FT=false --out csv=results/results_spike_noft_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).csv script.js
